event.title: Moon-based Solar Power
event.description: Moon-based solar power is now technically feasible. You can now build moon-based solar plants.

event.title: Wind Power Research Breakthrough
event.description: Breakthrough in wind turbine technology. Wind turbines are now much less expensive to produce and have a more positive economic impact.

event.title: Massive Natural Gas Field Discovered
event.description: Massive natural gas field discovered! The price of natural gas plummets.

event.title: Rise in Environmentalism
event.description: The population is experiencing a rise in evironmentalism. Environmentally-friendly actions now require less political capital.

event.title: Decline in Environmentalism
event.description: The population is experiencing a decline in evironmentalism. Environmentally-friendly actions now require more political capital.

event.title: Economic Boom
event.description: The economy is experiencing an unanticipated period of rapid growth. There is a significant increase in economic impact.

event.title: Solar Research Breakthrough
event.description: There has been a breakthrough in Solar Research. The price of solar technology has been dramatically reduced.

event.title: Nuclear Fusion Discovered
event.description: Nuclear Fusion has been discovered! Fusion technology enables the construction of nuclear plants that generate extremely cheap energy with zero greenhouse gas emissions.

event.title: Oil Spill
event.description: An offshore oil platform exploded and its well on the ocean floor is now leaking millions of gallons of oil into the ocean. This will have a devastating impact on the local marine environment and the local economy over the next couple of years.

event.title: Drought
event.description: Dry winds, excessive farming, and erosion has resulted in crop failure and shortage of water. The extended conditions of drought may result in social unrest and mass human migrations if not addressed in the near future. Confronting this issue requires you to reassess water usage, enforce water conservation & regulation laws, or invest in technologies that will help open supplementary water resources. This will have a devastating impact on the local environment and the local economy over the next couple of years.

event.title: Desertification
event.description: This part of the land is dwindling into an arid dry region, slowly losing any vegetation and wildlife. Deforestation, drought or unsustainable farming habits has only accelerated the formation of a desert. Implementing anti-desertification programs, managing the provisioning of water, and hyper-fertilization of the soil will help prevent and reclaim the land back to its original stasis. This will have a negative long-term impact on both the local environment and economy.
